articles.description: Pakistan wicketkeeping batter Mohammad Rizwan claims that the Pakistan Super League (PSL) is bigger and better than the Indian Premier League (IPL). He pointed out that reserve players are used in Pakistan's T20 competition.

articles.title: World Cup Ends, Qatar Left With Empty Hotels, Stadiums With No Future - NDTV
articles.description: The organizers - particularly FIFA - see the event as an outright success: a record TV audience, happy fans and a burnished brand. But however much soft power Qatar has gained from the tournament, the return to normality will be an epic comedown.
articles.content:
The World Cup preparations shone a light on the Gulf region's "kafala" sponsorship system.
When Qatar was drawn out of the envelope as a future host of the World Cup back in 2010, it was doubtful th… [+6957 chars]

articles.author: Rajan Raj
articles.title: Manoj Tiwary hints at retirement at the end of ongoing season - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Leading Bengal in Abhimanyu Easwaran's absence, Tiwary wants his team to take their game to "the next level" to try and win the Ranji Trophy
articles.content: "We have to play like champions. We won today, but it's not like we played exceptional cricket"  •  CAB

articles.author: Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Don't put pressure on him': Sachin reacts after Arjun Tendulkar's maiden Ranji Trophy century - The Indian Express
articles.description: Sachin Tendulkar reacted after his son, Arjun, emulated him by scoring a century on Ranji debut while playing for Goa.

articles.description: Ex-Argentina striker Gabriel Batistuta said he was happy to see Lionel Messi overtake him as the country's top scorer at the World Cup in Qatar
